alert.note: Alert for Pulaski; Starke (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 9:27PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Pulaski and southern Starke Counties through 1000 PM EDT/900 PM CDT/... At 927 PM EDT/827 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Dunns Bridge, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Knox, North Judson, Ripley, Lomax, Beardstown, English Lake, Vanmeter Park, Denham, Toto, Clarks, Winona, Bass Lake and San Pierre. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
